column5: I really felt you on this bro. I live in turkey and ı had no real ambission on what to do with my life as well. The whole country is a shithole and my major is something ı would never want. I  probably wont be able to get employed. I can go over it all but just know that ı can really relate with all of what you said. It is relaxing to know that ı am not alone bro. I hope that you can find what you want in life. If not then ı hope that in the end you will find the peace.
